verses.verse: I will stand<WH5975> on my guard<WH4931> post<WH4931> And station<WH3320> myself on the rampart;<WH4692> And I will keep<WH6822> watch<WH6822> to see<WH7200> what<WH4100> He will speak<WH1696> to me, And how<WH4100> I may reply<WH7725> when<WH5921> I am reproved.<WH9640>
Then the Lord<WH3068> answered<WH6030> me and said,<WH559> "Record<WH3789> the vision<WH2377> And inscribe<WH874> [it] on tablets,<WH3871> That the one who reads<WH7121> it may run.<WH7323>

"For the vision<WH2377> is yet<WH5750> for the appointed<WH4150> time;<WH4150> It hastens<WH6315> toward the goal,<WH7093> and it will not fail.<WH3576> Though<WH518> it tarries,<WH4102> wait<WH2442> for it; For it will certainly<WH935> come,<WH935> it will not delay.<WH309>
"Behold,<WH2009> as for the proud<WH6075> one, His soul<WH5315> is not right<WH3474> within him; But the righteous<WH6662> will live<WH2421> by his faith.<WH530>

"Furthermore,<WH637> wine<WH3196> betrays<WH898> the haughty<WH3093> man,<WH1397> So that he does not stay<WH5115> at home.<WH5115> He enlarges<WH7337> his appetite<WH5315> like Sheol,<WH7585> And he is like death,<WH4194> never<WH3808> satisfied.<WH7646> He also gathers<WH622> to himself all<WH3605> nations<WH1471> And collects<WH622> to himself all<WH3605> peoples.<WH5971>

"Will not all<WH3605> of these<WH428> take<WH5375> up a taunt-song against<WH5921> him, Even mockery<WH4426> [and] insinuations<WH2420> against him, And say,<WH559> 'Woe<WH1945> to him who increases<WH7235> what is not his – For how<WH4970> long<WH5704> <WH4970> – And makes<WH3513> himself rich<WH3513> with loans<WH5671>?'
"Will not your creditors<WH5391> rise<WH6965> up suddenly,<WH6621> And those who collect<WH2111> from you awaken<WH3364>? Indeed, you will become<WH1961> plunder<WH4933> for them.

"Because<WH3588> you have looted<WH7997> many<WH7227> nations,<WH1471> All<WH3605> the remainder<WH3499> of the peoples<WH5971> will loot<WH7997> you – Because<WH4480> of human<WH120> bloodshed<WH1818> and violence<WH2555> done to the land,<WH776> To the town<WH7151> and all<WH3605> its inhabitants.<WH3427>
"Woe<WH1945> to him who gets<WH1214> evil<WH7451> gain<WH1215> for his house<WH1004> To put<WH7760> his nest<WH7064> on high<WH4791> To be delivered<WH5337> from the hand<WH3709> of calamity!<WH9563>
"You have devised<WH3289> a shameful<WH1322> thing<WH1322> for your house<WH1004> By cutting<WH7096> off<WH7096> many<WH7227> peoples;<WH5971> So you are sinning<WH2398> against yourself.<WH5315>
"Surely<WH3588> the stone<WH68> will cry<WH2199> out from the wall,<WH7023> And the rafter<WH3714> will answer<WH6030> it from the framework.<WH6086>
"Woe<WH1945> to him who builds<WH1129> a city<WH5892> with bloodshed<WH1818> And founds<WH3559> a town<WH7151> with violence!<WH9390>
"Is it not indeed<WH2009> from the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> That peoples<WH5971> toil<WH3021> for fire,<WH784> And nations<WH3816> grow<WH3286> weary<WH3286> for nothing<WH7385>?
"For the earth<WH776> will be filled<WH4390> With the knowledge<WH3045> of the glory<WH9202> of the Lord,<WH3068> As the waters<WH4325> cover<WH3680> the sea.<WH3220>

"Woe<WH1945> to you who make your neighbors<WH7453> drink,<WH8248> Who mix<WH5596> in your venom<WH2534> even<WH637> to make<WH7937> [them] drunk<WH7937> So<WH4616> as to look<WH5027> on their nakedness!<WH4589>

"You will be filled<WH7646> with disgrace<WH7036> rather<WH4480> than<WH4480> honor.<WH9202> Now<WH1571> you yourself<WH859> drink<WH8354> and expose<WH6188> your [own] nakedness.<WH6188> The cup<WH3563> in the Lord's right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> will come<WH5437> around<WH5437> to you, And utter<WH7022> disgrace<WH7022> [will come] upon your glory.<WH9202>

"For the violence<WH2555> done to Lebanon<WH3844> will overwhelm<WH3680> you, And the devastation<WH7701> of [its] beasts<WH929> by which you terrified<WH2865> them, Because<WH4480> of human<WH120> bloodshed<WH1818> and violence<WH2555> done to the land,<WH776> To the town<WH7151> and all<WH3605> its inhabitants.<WH3427>

"What<WH4100> profit<WH3276> is the idol<WH6459> when<WH3588> its maker<WH3335> has carved<WH6458> it, [Or] an image,<WH4541> a teacher<WH3384> of falsehood<WH8267>? For [its] maker<WH3335> trusts<WH982> in his [own] handiwork<WH3336> When he fashions<WH6213> speechless<WH483> idols.<WH457>

"Woe<WH1945> to him who says<WH559> to a [piece of] wood,<WH6086> 'Awake!<WH9516>' To a dumb<WH1748> stone,<WH68> 'Arise!<WH5782>' [And] that is [your] teacher<WH3384>? Behold,<WH2009> it is overlaid<WH8610> with gold<WH2091> and silver,<WH3701> And there<WH369> is no<WH369> breath<WH7307> at all<WH3605> inside<WH7130> it.
"But the Lord<WH3068> is in His holy<WH6944> temple.<WH1964> Let all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> be silent<WH2013> before<WH4480> <WH6440> Him."
